TopicTitle: A bit weird(for me) forum mentality.

Articles.Content:
Sometimes in official threads i see people posting their creations in full album size.

For me its a bit weird while reading about an update and the discussion around it 

to see some full sized album reply showing off personal creations(which most times are trully amazing).

I understand the pleasure to share off a nice looking creations but i never really felt the itch to do it in an official thread that needs more ''relative'' discussion in general.

Its not a big a deal and i am not trying to be toxic, it just tickles me when i see it and i wanted to share it.Thats all  .

 

 

Edited August 21, 2019 by Boyster

Your comment has been moved to Kerbal Network, since it's about the forum rather than the game. 

Glad you're tickled.

Why do people post pictures of their kids on facebook?

They want to "share" their new craft where they get the most feedback.
Maybe the forum engine has some plugin to autothumb pictures larger 100x100 to make them a set of clickable thumbs to full-sized originals?
